Datalakes¶

The Datalakes adapter is designed to output specified bands to JSON format in order to facilitate web visualisation in the Datalakes data portal https://www.datalakes-eawag.ch/.

adapters.datalakes.datalakes.apply(env, params, l2product_files, date)¶

Apply datalakes adapter. 1. Converts specified band in NetCDF to JSON format 2. Saves files to S3 storage 3. Hits Datalakes endpoint to inform server of new data

params

Dictionary of parameters, loaded from input file

env

Dictionary of environment parameters, loaded from input file

l2product_files

Dictionary of Level 2 product files created by processors

date

Run date

adapters.datalakes.datalakes.nc_to_json(input_file, output_file, variable_name, value_read_expression)¶
adapters.datalakes.datalakes.notify_datalakes(api_key)¶
